h2.script: show_translated_sentence('Do you control the image that others have about you?')

p.script: show_translated_sentence('This is really difficult, but for the first time you have the perfect tool to control your image. Create your own website and digital business card for only 9 euros.')

h2.script: show_translated_sentence('Have you looked for your name on Google?')

p.script: show_translated_sentence('You do not have the control of your public information. Create your own digital business card and show only what you want to show the world about you.')

h2.script: show_translated_sentence('Do you have a business or you know someone with one?')

p.script: show_translated_sentence('Do not you have a website? You are losing money and opportunities! Create a web page / digital business card in 3 minutes and start earning.')

show_translated_sentence('Get your digital business card with the latest web technology and enjoy with no limits. Every device.')
show_translated_sentence('Share your business card with one click and connect with all social networks.')

show_translated_sentence("You have at your disposal many templates. Choose yours and start using your digital business card!")
